mapper.select: select sc_title, to_char(sc_sdate, 'yy-mm-dd') sc_sdate, to_char(sc_edate, 'yy-mm-dd') sc_edate from schedule
mapper.insert: insert into schedule (sc_no, sc_title, sc_sdate, sc_edate, users_no) values (#{sc_no},#{sc_title}, #{sc_sdate}, #{sc_edate}, 'U_23_0001')
mapper.select: select 'sc_' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD') || '_' || LPAD((SEQ_SC.nextval), 4,'0') from (select count(*) from schedule)
